attributes.action: Chris Shaw and Mick Burnett are killing Grimsby
attributes.additional_details:
How much more Money can these guys waste in our town
Bodged town center and train station
allowing shoddy work to go ahead
leisure centre fiasco
freeman st
speed cameras
pay rises

and to top it off putting up our council tax after wasting over £5.000.000

we don't want them to represent our town
we want them out of office

sign if you want them out
